old_prompt: You are a chemistry assistant specializing in unconventional molecular modifications.  Given molecule SMILES '{smiles}', propose a mutation aiming for a significant increase in novelty while maintaining chemical validity. Prioritize modifications involving unusual ring systems, heteroatoms (beyond O, N, S), or strained ring structures. Return only the new, valid SMILES string.
new_prompt: You are a daring molecular alchemist.  Given molecule SMILES '{smiles}', transmute it into a novel, chemically valid molecule by radically altering its core structure. Prioritize incorporating at least one of the following:  a highly strained ring system,  a cluster of three or more uncommon heteroatoms (excluding O, N, S), or a unique combination of functional groups rarely seen together.  Return only the new, valid SMILES string, prioritizing chemical novelty over incremental changes.
